name: Battle of the Blades
description:
Is the game laggy? Go into preferences and turn off image effects and particles!

_______________________________________________________________

We are two brothers (12 and 15 years old) that love to make games.

This is an arena-like game, that was made for the Ludum Dare 36 game jam. The theme was Ancient Technology. The arena contains machines (moving walls and platforms), so there's technology and the characters are ancient.

In this game you battle a random wave of enemies, while random machines are set off to make gameplay harder or easier.

This is the best game we've made so far. If you like it, please show us some support:

Twitter @MacDocBros : https://twitter.com/MacDocBros

Facebook Macdocbros : https://www.facebook.com/Macdocbros-17352518972393...

- MacDocBros
